sentence.Network_en: Byron's consumed memoirs possessed the merit of being well and entertainingly written.
sentence.Network_cn: 拜伦烧掉的文集集中了他写的好文章的精华.

sentence.Network_en: Such impressions must be entertainingly novel to the civilized person.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些印象对文明人说来,准是新奇得引人入胜的.

sentence.Network_en: Justin Fox's description of how the idea evolved and conquered is fascinating and entertainingly told.
sentence.Network_cn: JustinFox关于如何让这个想法进化以及取胜的描述是令人着迷的,并且讲述的方式很搞笑.
